text: @realDonaldTrump So let’s recap.  We have at this point 78,000 dead and the three most important people who run the anti-covid19 work have to quarantine themselves because you morons don’t wear masks.   Transition to what?   Laughing stock along 1rst world countries.   #dipshit, #lyingsackofshit
